casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sonya Case HARRIS. No. 25P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 18, 2006. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Sonya Case Harris. Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of January 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of January 2006."
